open.title: Vumatel Outage | Kuils River South
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Vumatel clients in Kuils River South, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
